name: KisanMitra
description: Provides daily weather-based farming tips, forecasts, and emergency alerts for Indian farmers.

functions.name: get-farmer-advice
functions.description: Get daily farming advice based on crop and region, with optional language preference.

crop.description: The name of the crop. Example: wheat, rice, maize

region.description: Region name or city where the crop is grown. Example: Delhi, Punjab, Lucknow

lang.description: Language code for the advice. 'en' for English, 'hi' for Hindi. Default: 'en'
